Identity.Name: Celintran Battle Seraph
Identity.Basic_Description: Unhooded gray robed mage with blue or gold aura wings with a battlestaph

Abilities.Name: Flying
Abilities.Ability: This unit can move vertically without spending movement.

Abilities.Name: Inspire
Abilities.Ability: All units within 3 range of Celintran Battle Seraph gain 1 speed and 1 stamina.

Abilities.Name: Aura Shield
Abilities.Ability: Once per turn as an action, put a shield template around a unit. That unit gains +2 block the next time it is attacked. (This ability does not stack)

Abilities.Name: Bestow Aura
Abilities.Ability: Once per turn as an action, put an inspire template around a unit. That unit gains +2 skill the next time it attacks. (This ability does not stack)
